page.title: 18BILLERICAY NW Life Styles.
page.content: {A Day in the Life of a Schoolchild. I am woken up at 7.15am, put on my school uniform and after a breakfast of cereal and toast, there is an opportunity to watch early morning TV. When we get to school the boys play football in the playground, but I and some of my friends go to{recorder practice before assembly. The mornings are taken up with lessons, but some classes travel by coach to the local {swimming pool.}We have a short playtime half way through the morning. Many of us take a packed lunch to school but others, who wish to pay, may have a school dinner. Lessons, including art, games and PE, take place in the afternoon. When I get home I watch TV whilst drinking tea and eating crisps. In the evening I watch more TV until 9.00pm.
